TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Michael_Jackson, title = Michael_Jackson, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Jackson} }

S.FORM: King of pop musichya' ga maki' squw kawas tay kawas sa 1989 cinrahu' kmayal niy Elizabeth Taylor iy Michaelsa pabu' sa mabu' na ungak na Soul train qasa. mhtuw sa ryax tay 29 sa byacing tay 8 sa kawas tay 1958. aring niya' sa 'laqi' ga yasa knaki' niya' sa srhgun iyal mlahang niy yaba' niya', ruw msqun kbalay sa "Jackson Family Chorus" squw mintsway' na qutux nggasal naha'. mpitu' kawas squw kawas ka 1964 gaa yasa ciqsu' niya' musa' mqwas sa glaing na squliq, babaw niya' lgamgluw balay squw "Jackson Five" sa mintsway' niya', ruw tayhuk kawas tay 1971 lga aring kyya muci' nanak mwah mqwas la. ryax qnxan niya' ga 10 quw wal niya' pwahun senmong qwas niya' nanak, ruw 6quw iga' pin'iga' niya'. pinhtuw niya' qwas niya' nanak sa kawas tay 1982 ka "Thriller"ga ana mucing misuq qaniy na' ga ungat hmzinas kin pzyux iyal wal bzirun na squliq qwas saxa' nanak. bzinah na qwas na saxa' nanak ga, kwara' kinna "Off The Wall"sa kawas tay 1979, ruw "Bad "sa kawas tay 1987, ruw "Dangerous"sa kawas tay 1991, ruw "HIStory"sa kawas tay 1995 uziy ga wal mluw sa pzyang balay cingay wal berun na squliq uziy. min sazing mzyup sa "Rock and Roll Hall of Fame" quw "Michael Jackson" qaniy, wal naha' bzyagan sa qsahuy na "Songwritters Hall of Fame", ruw hiya' uziy qutux hi' nanak thuzyay mzyup squw "Dance Hall of Fame" na Rtuko'ungak na hayyo. Pincyuwagan niya' ka kinblayqan lalu' sa bzinah ka pzyux balay lamu' na "King's world record", 13 quw "Grammy Awards" ruw "Grammy Legend Awards" squw "Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award"; 26 quw "American Music Awards", yasa quw siy se pzyang balay ttrhwan lalu' na hayyo. Sa qsahuy niya' kwara' kin na "Artist of the Century" ruw "kawas tay 80 ka ray20seki' na Artist of the 1980's"; ryyax kinbcyan niya' mwah mqwas nanak ga, 13quw 'nagal niya' American champion single, maki' squw "Billboard Hot 100" ga wal niya' haynasun kwara' hayyo na mmlikuy; uw hmzinas yong'oku kinpzyux kirok na wal niya' sbaziys qwas niya'. "Michael Jackson" hiya' ga siy se muciy aring maki' kwara' rikisi' nyux kbalay Ryoko na ungak qaniy ga pzyang cingay wal galun qnabu' na tthawki' na phayyo na squliq . snbil qwas na saxa' nanak niy Jackson ka "Detached" ka sinxalan na qwas "Love Never Felt So Good"ga maki' sa ryax sa 21 sa byacing tay 5 sa kawas tay 2014 ga wal mintazil sa tay 9 lalu' sa "Billboard Hot 100", "Michael Jackson" qaniy ga aring sraral ruw misuw qaniy ga nanak hiya' wal thuzyay magal sa tay glaing lalu' na phayyo squw ini' ptnaq kin zmagal pawpuw kawas ga wal thuzyay mintta' squw "Billboard Hot 100"lalu' niya'. maki squw kawas tay 2000 ga, 39 kwara' quw rmnaw hiya' miq sa bir' na smmrhuw sinhuzyay lalu' na King's world record iyua', wala' niya' hnasun kwara' ana ima' sucya la. maki squw kawas tay 1985 ga laha' squw "Lionel Richie" mgluw ruw splawa' naha' kwara' hayyo mwah mqwas sa qwas na musa' rmaw sa mqzinut lelaqi' beh kya Africa"We Are The World". zyugi' na "Moonwalk" ruw "Mechanical dance" ruw "45 degree angle tilt" ga yasa quw niwan alu'a rqyas niya'. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Michael Jackson

King of pop mosichya' ga maki' sqow kawas tay kawas sa 1989 cinraho' kmayal niy Elizabeth Taylor iy Michaelsa pabo' sa mabo' na ongak na Sool train qasa. mhtow sa ryax tay 29 sa byacing tay 8 sa kawas tay 1958. aring niya' sa 'laqi' ga yasa knaki' niya' sa srhgon iyal mlahang niy yaba' niya', row msqon kbalay sa "Jackson Family Choros" sqow mintsway' na qotox nggasal naha'. mpito' kawas sqow kawas ka 1964 gaa yasa ciqso' niya' mosa' mqwas sa glaing na sqoliq, babaw niya' lgamglow balay sqow "Jackson Five" sa mintsway' niya', row tayhok kawas tay 1971 lga aring kyya moci' nanak mwah mqwas la. ryax qnxan niya' ga 10 qow wal niya' pwahon senmong qwas niya' nanak, row 6qow iga' pin'iga' niya'. pinhtow niya' qwas niya' nanak sa kawas tay 1982 ka "Thriller"ga ana mocing misoq qaniy na' ga ongat hmzinas kin pzyox iyal wal bziron na sqoliq qwas saxa' nanak. bzinah na qwas na saxa' nanak ga, kwara' kinna "Off The Wall"sa kawas tay 1979, row "Bad "sa kawas tay 1987, row "Dangeroos"sa kawas tay 1991, row "HIStory"sa kawas tay 1995 oziy ga wal mlow sa pzyang balay cingay wal beron na sqoliq oziy. min sazing mzyop sa "Rock and Roll Hall of Fame" qow "Michael Jackson" qaniy, wal naha' bzyagan sa qsahoy na "Songwritters Hall of Fame", row hiya' oziy qotox hi' nanak thozyay mzyop sqow "Dance Hall of Fame" na Rtoko'ongak na hayyo. Pincyowagan niya' ka kinblayqan lalo' sa bzinah ka pzyox balay lamo' na "King's world record", 13 qow "Grammy Awards" row "Grammy Legend Awards" sqow "Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award"; 26 qow "American Mosic Awards", yasa qow siy se pzyang balay ttrhwan lalo' na hayyo. Sa qsahoy niya' kwara' kin na "Artist of the Centory" row "kawas tay 80 ka ray20seki' na Artist of the 1980's"; ryyax kinbcyan niya' mwah mqwas nanak ga, 13qow 'nagal niya' American champion single, maki' sqow "Billboard Hot 100" ga wal niya' haynason kwara' hayyo na mmlikoy; ow hmzinas yong'oko kinpzyox kirok na wal niya' sbaziys qwas niya'. "Michael Jackson" hiya' ga siy se mociy aring maki' kwara' rikisi' nyox kbalay Ryoko na ongak qaniy ga pzyang cingay wal galon qnabo' na tthawki' na phayyo na sqoliq . snbil qwas na saxa' nanak niy Jackson ka "Detached" ka sinxalan na qwas "Love Never Felt So Good"ga maki' sa ryax sa 21 sa byacing tay 5 sa kawas tay 2014 ga wal mintazil sa tay 9 lalo' sa "Billboard Hot 100", "Michael Jackson" qaniy ga aring sraral row misow qaniy ga nanak hiya' wal thozyay magal sa tay glaing lalo' na phayyo sqow ini' ptnaq kin zmagal pawpow kawas ga wal thozyay mintta' sqow "Billboard Hot 100"lalo' niya'. maki sqow kawas tay 2000 ga, 39 kwara' qow rmnaw hiya' miq sa bir' na smmrhow sinhozyay lalo' na King's world record iyoa', wala' niya' hnason kwara' ana ima' socya la. maki sqow kawas tay 1985 ga laha' sqow "Lionel Richie" mglow row splawa' naha' kwara' hayyo mwah mqwas sa qwas na mosa' rmaw sa mqzinot lelaqi' beh kya Africa"We Are The World". zyogi' na "Moonwalk" row "Mechanical dance" row "45 degree angle tilt" ga yasa qow niwan alo'a rqyas niya'. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Michael Jackson
